sentences.en: As for a political settlement in Laos, the North Vietnamese leaders remained evasive.
sentences.cn: 在老挝问题的政治解决方面, 北越领导人的态度仍然捉摸不定.

sentences.en: As language, these passive statements are weak; as statements, they are evasive and vague.
sentences.cn: 作为语言, 这些被动句是软弱无力的; 作为说明, 它们又是含糊不可捉摸的.

sentences.en: At least four high-flying warplanes had to take evasive action.
sentences.cn: 至少有4架高空飞行战斗机不得不采取避让行动。

sentences.en: But many doctors woefully evasive in talking with their patients.
sentences.cn: 但相当多的医生在和病人谈话时规避地厉害.

sentences.en: Daily requests led to evasive answers.
sentences.cn: 每天的不断的催促得到的是闪烁其词的答复.
他闪闪烁烁,不肯说明确.

sentences.en: He was evasive, to the point of secretiveness.
sentences.cn: 他含糊其辞，让人觉得有意隐瞒。

sentences.en: His eyes gleamed with a smart, evasive light.
sentences.cn: 他那对眼睛闪耀着一种灵活的难以捉摸的光芒.

sentences.en: If the bullets start coming this way, take evasive action.
sentences.cn: 如果子弹朝这边打来, 就采取规避动作.

sentences.en: Karen seems open and straight forward, Amy hostile and evasive.
sentences.cn: 卡伦落落大方,直言快语;而埃米却是心存芥蒂, 言辞含糊.

sentences.en: On November 11 M Maisky brought to me Stalin's chilling and evasive reply to this message.
sentences.cn: 11月11日,麦斯基先生把斯大林对这封电报的冷淡的措词闪烁的复电交给了我.
她给了个模棱两可的回答.

sentences.en: The German Foreign Office was evasive.
The pilot took evasive action to avoid a collision with the enemy aircraft.
sentences.cn: 驾驶员采取规避动作以免与敌机相撞.

sentences.en: Yossarian was the best man in the group at evasive action, but had no idea why.
sentences.cn: 整个大队里,约索林的规避动作做得最好, 可是他自己也不知道这是什么原因.
